price: 36. Hinnak usun qaranwaa kee baaxó gineeni innaa? Aleey, tonna hinna usun Yallih digaala asmite waanaah, Yallih inkittinaane nummayse waana ikkal.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
